short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annotate your website as part of your marketing workflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Encodify is a global technology service that provides a wide range of marketing work management solutions to marketing professionals. 

With Encodify for Chrome you can easily annotate HTML or URL links within Encodify Proofing automatically generating a screenshot as an attachment to your comment 

This is a free to use plugin as long as you have a subscription including Encodify Proofing.

We believe in a consolidated way of working. All your creative operations should work together as part of the same process across your organisation. We keep it simple because the world is complex enough as it is.
